title: Weak HSTS age in support hackerone site

profile.name: HackerOne
profile.about: Vulnerability disclosure should be safe, transparent, and rewarding.

vulnerability_information:

Connection: keep-alive
Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Content-Length: 0
User-Agent: Jakarta Commons-HttpClient/3.1
Host: support.hackerone.com

Response header:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

Date: Tue, 01 Sep 2015 06:52:11 GMT

activities.message:
Hello @josephjose_96, 

I'm looking into it and will get back to you with an update.
activities.markdown_message:
Hello @josephjose_96,

I'm looking into it and will get back to you with an update.

activities.message: We're HSTS preloaded in all major browsers for hackerone.com and *.hackerone.com, so this really isn't a problem for normal browsing, as we'll always use https://. Also, since this is managed by Zendesk, we don't really have control over it. I've asked Zendesk to see if they can raise it, but no idea if they can. Either case, going to close this out.
activities.markdown_message: We're HSTS preloaded in all major browsers for hackerone.com and *.hackerone.com, so this really isn't a problem for normal browsing, as we'll always use https://. Also, since this is managed by Zendesk, we don't really have control over it. I've asked Zendesk to see if they can raise it, but no idea if they can. Either case, going to close this out.

activities.message:
I poked Zendesk on this again (after poking them a long time ago about it), and they were able to increase the max-age for us.

```
| => curl -I https://support.hackerone.com
...
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000;
```

So, appreciate the poke. :)
activities.markdown_message:
I poked Zendesk on this again (after poking them a long time ago about it), and they were able to increase the max-age for us.

| => curl -I https://support.hackerone.com
...
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000;

So, appreciate the poke. :)

activities.message: We only pay bounties for critical/severe issues in such third-party sites/services that we use, but I have added you to our HoF.
activities.markdown_message: We only pay bounties for critical/severe issues in such third-party sites/services that we use, but I have added you to our HoF.

activities.message: Mmmmm... This is a small issue. I am interested in disclosing :)
activities.markdown_message: Mmmmm... This is a small issue. I am interested in disclosing :)
